content: **i m unable to offer pattern support for my free patterns via ravelry pm or email - please visit the wormhead s hats group 1 if you have a question about this pattern thanks for your understanding ** **pattern updated 19/6/14 - please download the latest version ** knitted using only 50g of aran/worsted weight yarn this hat is a super quick knit **yarn** 99yd/90m/50g aran weight multi-plied yarn **needles & notions** set 4 5mm/uk7/us7 dpns/circular or size needed to obtain gauge 4 5mm crochet hook stitch marker as necessary tapestry needle **sample details** shown in ashford tekapo 218yd/199m per 100g 100% wool shown in size 16in/40 75cm on model with 16in/40 75cm circumference head **gauge** 18 sts x 24 row to 4in/10cm on 4 5mm needles over st st **sizes** to fit sizes 12 14 16 in/30 5 35 5 40 75 cm finished size 11 5 13 25 15 in/29 25 33 75 38 cm **skills required** knit & purl sts knitting in the round 3-needle bind-off or kitchener stitch **note** not sure which size to make grab a tape measure babies heads vary greatly a typical newborn size is roughly 14in typical year is 18in but these are only averages **accessibility statement** the main pdf for this pattern is colour blind accessible it uses black text on a white background and does not rely on colour published 2006 product code ww038fbabytripeak versione italiana disponibile per il download dal sito web link del progettista sopra traduzione di b ajroldi per www tricotting com 1 http //www ravelry com/discuss/woolly-wormheads-hats/1823897/1-25#21
